oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Holy Ghost Church, 1957
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Holy Ghost Church Christmas pageant in church basement. December 1957. Shows Three Kings, Mary, Joseph & Baby, angels, shepherds. Christmas tree at left.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Catholic churches; Pageants; Children; Group portraits; Christmas trees;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
